mappings.notes: Secret engine and auth method mounts are addressed by path; the path is the key in ListMounts responses rather than a struct field. Keep mount path as externalId in the adapter ACL.
Audit devices are configured per mount path. Treat audit config as provider-native; map to ExternalObjectRef.
Token create is an action request object; resulting token accessor/id is returned in Secret auth payloads. Keep token surfaces as ExternalObjectRef for MVP.
Secrets and their versioned metadata remain provider-native. Map KV v2 secret metadata to ExternalObjectRef until VAOP defines canonical secret/document semantics.
Vault responses are wrapped in Secret envelopes. Keep Secret as a transport-level ExternalObjectRef for adapter contract tests and evidence.
